title: Courgette Bread with Cinnamon Sugar
ingredients: ['3 beaten eggs', '250ml vegetable oil', '400g caster sugar', '2 courgette, grated', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '80g raisins', '375g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
